body.name: Shower Mirror Fogless for Shaving,Larger 11x8 in Mirror for Wall Hanging,Frameless Portable Camping Travel Mirrors,Unbreakable Handheld Locker,Makeup Plastic,Shave Mirror,Bathroom Anti Fog Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 24 mins
features: (Shatterproof Material): Shower mirror made of plexiglass,Unbreakable,safety,bendable, will not be rupture if accidentally dropped on the ground, not a real glass mirror, very safe,your kids and pets can play with peace of mind

(Super value): Shatterproof hanging mirror, the best size for women's makeup and men's shaving. Dimensions about 10.7 x 8 in, Large enough to look in the mirror, can be used as a handheld mirror,illuminate any part of the entire face in all directions

(Light enough for travel, Place of use): Camping mirror round corner design, locker mirror suitable for non-porous, smooth and flat surfaces, small hanging mirror also portable for travel. mirror for shower can be used in bathroom, bedroom, wardrobe, doorway, wall, wall-mounted mirror
(Handheld & Removable): Shaving mirror can easily remove from the hook, So you can get a closer look; Hold hand held mirror at different angles to get a comfortably close shaving

(Note): Before small wall mirror first use, be sure to tear off the protective film on the front (If the protective film is not torn off, The mirror surface will be blurred). Only use a soft cloth and warm water to clean the mirror, please do not wipe it directly with your hands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mirror for the price
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is good quality and size for the price. The design is better than the ones that just have a paint on the back that makes it reflective that is liable to peel off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mirror does fog up, but overall it is not bad for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars fogs up fast
reviews.reviewText: I do like this little mirror, it looks nice in my bathroom and the little hook that comes with it is a nice size but it absolutely DOES fog up, I have to continuously wipe the mirror off each time it fogs up when I'm taking a shower and I'm doing my skincare. Oh well! I still like it and I'll keep it, but it isn't truly fogless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silly gift for grandson
reviews.reviewText: My 6 year old grandson loves to shave with his pretend “shaver” as he calls it. He always likes when I sneak in to make him a fish fin hairdo or spike it up. These moments are beautiful memories and without him understanding he gets a good head washing with lots of giggles. He would have to step out of the tub to see it. So I had him sit down in the tub to place it perfectly to see in. He loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: Only had 3 weeks, mirror sticker is peeling and coming off very poorly made item just a piece of clear plastic and mirror sticker could of been made much better this is garbage that would not last a month save money and this fogs up just like any mirror sooooo false advertising forsure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This piece of plastic with a cheap reflective coat of something, got all foggy as soon as I turned on the shower and yes, I previously removed the protective film as indicated in the label.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this mirror for our shower. It is so nice that we take it with us on our vacations hanging it with a command picture hanger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not so much anti fog
reviews.reviewText: It’s a plastic mirror, which is what I expected. But it is never not fogged up. So I rinse the mirror a lot. It works but you will have to wipe or rinse while shaving a few times. Don’t hate it. But will eventually replace it. It’s fine for now. The price works great and it does work. But it just need to be rinsed or wipe a lot.
